title: [Cancer] Largest study of its kind shows leafy greens may decrease bowel cancer risk | It suggests that increasing the intake of folate – which can be found in leafy greens, such as spinach, cabbage and broccoli – could help to reduce the risk of colorectal cancer by up to 7%

[Neuroscience] Why reading nursery rhymes and singing to babies may help them to learn language | Babies don’t begin to process phonetic information reliably until seven months old – which researchers say is too late to form the foundation of language
